profile.name: Clément Bussière
about: I'm a French engineer passionate about web development.
I love building <0>clean</0>, <1>fast</1>, <2>intuitive</2> UIs and writing <3>elegant</3> and <4>reliable</4> code.
In general I love turning ideas into apps that people enjoy using.

work.description: Developing a best-in-class labeling platform for powering data-centric approaches to Machine Learning.

chrysalide.title: Dans notre chrysalide
chrysalide.description: A website to book care services for newborns provided by Camille, a perinatal support nurse in Lyon, France.

aoc2025.title: Advent of Code 2025
aoc2025.description: My current progression on the Advent of Code 2025 from Wastl - currently on day 10 of 12.

deathwatch.title: Warhammer 40k App
deathwatch.description: A web app designed to streamline my Warhammer 40k narrative sessions as Game Master
